description.value:
As a standard action, the shaman assumes a form that combines the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{Enlarge Person} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.tu4khwqbkcnel7zq]{Deadly Juggernaut} for 1 minute or until dismissed.

The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.
